comments.body:
Hi, Guys.

The `timeout` argument is Python 3 only feature.
- https://docs.python.org/2/library/subprocess.html#subprocess.Popen.wait
- https://docs.python.org/3/library/subprocess.html#subprocess.Popen.wait

Since this will break Python 2.7 test in all branches. I'll revert this commit from all the branches.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +53,57 @@        # request shutdown
        terminator(daemon)
        daemon.wait(5)

        # daemon should no longer accept connections
